remarks: The predicate ` G ` has a left and right identity element.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
isexid.1 $e |- X = dom dom G $.
isexid $p |- ( G e. A -> ( G e. ExId <-> E. x e. X A. y e. X ( ( x G y ) = y /\ ( y G x ) = y ) ) ) $.
$d G x y $.
$d X x y $.
